Posts.Content: I can't afford 10%!! Is it too late to cancel the surgery??
Posts.Title: Two weeks post surgery

Posts.Content: My first post. Had biopsy, now scheduled for DaVinci surgery on Feb.2. Scares me big time! I am 62 years old. Have battled lung cancer. Now, gonna take this on, but long term effects scare me! Any help appreciated!
